Nushrat Bharucha Wiki | Biography | Movies | Family | Salary | Height

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Nushrat Bharucha is an Indian Film and Television Actress. She also works in the Hindi and Telugu Film Industry. She was made her on-screen debut with Hindi Movie Jai Santoshi Maa in 2006.

Biography & Wiki

Nushrat Bharucha’s nickname is Babu. She was born on 17 May 1985 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 34 years. Nushrat’s Zodiac is Taurus. Her hometown is Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Her nationality is Indian. Nushrat Bharucha belongs to the Shia sect (Dawoodi Bohra Community) of a Muslim Family.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Nushrat’s height in feet is 4’ 9”. Also, her height in Centimeters is 152 cm.

Family Members

Nushrat Bharucha is the daughter of Tanvir Bharucha who owns a business of heat-resistant ceramic coating. Her mother Tasneem Bharucha is a homemaker. Nushrat is the only child of her parents and very close to her all family members. She has one younger brother who’s name is Zain-ul-Bharucha. She also has an elder sister.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Nushrat had a relationship with actor and co-star Kartik Aaryan after their hit movie “Pyaar Ka Punchnama”. There is a new buzz that Nushrat is currently dated with Luv Ranjan who is the director of Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety.

Education and School, College

Nushrat Bharucha completed her schooling at Lilavatibai Poddar High School, Mumbai. After that, she completed her graduation from Jai Hind College, Mumbai.

Favourite Things

Salary and Net Worth

Nushrat Bharucha has an estimated net worth of $2 million dollars as of 2019. She charges Rs 50 to 60 lakh per film as salary. She is having a BMW X3 car.

Contact Address

Nushrat Bharucha Filmography

Nushrat Bharucha works in Hindi and Telugu Film Industry. She was made her on-screen debut with Hindi Movie Jai Santoshi Maa (2006) and Her Telugu Debut Taj Mahal (2010). She worked in Love Sex Aur Dhokha directed by Dibakar Banerjee and shot to prominence with Pyaar Ka Punchnama (2011) produced by Wide Frame wicked pictures. Nushrat Bharucha also appeared in Two Television Serials Kittie Party (2002) and Seven (2010).

Nusrat’s latest feature film is Luv Ranjan’s “Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety” released on 23 February 2018. This movie is a massive hit and has a total revenue of ₹500 million.

Nushrat Bharucha has also acted in the Yash Raj Films television series “Seven”. She has also appeared in many TV advertisements. She once mentioned in an interview with IndiaToday, “I have never been to an acting school and was trained at auditions.”

Awards & Recognition

Nusrat received Several Awards & Nominations her acting performance.

  • She won BIG Star Entertainment Awards in BIG Star Most Entertaining Actor in a Comedy Role – Female Category.
  • In 2014 she Grabs the “Dada Saheb Phalke Film Foundation Awards” for “Best Actress in a Negative Role”.
  • She received “Bollywood Film Journalist’s Awards” for “Power Brand Rising Star award”.

Facts about Nushrat Bharucha

  • She actively took part in plays and drama in her school days.
  • Nushrat then continued doing theatre for a few years.
  • Nushrat started her career with an ad commercial alongside actress Asin.
  • Although Nushrat loves to eat non-vegetarian food, she turned vegan during the shooting for the film “Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety.”
  • She is a huge fan of Ranbir Kapoor.
